website_summaries.verdict: Improve skin texture in a single application with a soothing mask.
pros: A small amount of product goes a long way
Skin is left polished and soft, and this product sustains such results overtime
Free of parabens, fragrances, and colors
cons: The natural ingredients may have an organic smell

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail of face masks!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for over 2 months now and can confidently say that I will be ordering more. This mud mask is the only mask that does not contain much chemical ingredients and the first ingredient listed is actual mud. I bought another tool to help smear this on my face easier. Cleaning up afterwards is a bit of a hassle but it’s worth it in my opinion. It leaves my skin feeling baby smooth and visibly reduces pimples overnight. The smell isn’t so bad either. I use this product once a week during my PM routine!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Truong

customer_reviews.title: That's Treatment-grade mask
customer_reviews.text: I've already bought six jars for three times that are for my friends and myself. And I have to admit it's so amazing. It's very effective for acne, shrinking pores, and tightening skin. I use the mask every other days or so. If the mask is cheaper a little , that will be much better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Aipingkc

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this because my normal go-to mud mask is much more expensive. This mask is not bad but I can definitely tell it's not as effective as the other mask I use. This one is thin and gritty, and requires using a lot to get full coverage. If you rub mud over one area and go back over it, it's completely removed. Useable in a tight spot but there are definitely better mud masks out there.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Not for dry, sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually fine with mud masks because they're cooling and moisturizing but the second I put this one on my skin was SCREAMING. I quickly washed it off and my skin was bright red and blazing. I'm sure it isn't the products fault and more-so is mine, but I will be getting a refund for it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon and Catherine Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Soothing
customer_reviews.text: A very soothing, rejuvenating mud mask! I bought this to use while recieving harsh perscription treatments for my acne and could no longer use aggresive products like the Aztec mud mask. It dries down, but is not tight like other masks and when I rinse it off, my skin is left smooth, soothed, and hydrated. It’s very gentle and I use it up to three times a week.
customer_reviews.author: KaTT

customer_reviews.title: Soothing and cool on your skin
customer_reviews.text: Soothing and cool on your skin! After you rinse you are left with baby soft clean and clear skin. Feels good on any parts. I even rubbed some on my feet. Good product and a very reasonable price. The real deal for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: It's ok I guess. I use it as directed for the most part. I let it sit slightly longer than recommended but I don't exactly see any difference or benefits of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Very watery.
customer_reviews.text: Very watery . This brand is not good , I bought the wrong one on accident . The New York biology is a better brand and actually pulls the bad oils from your skin .
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Healing Mud!
customer_reviews.text: This mud mask has done so much for our complexion. But, I have also used it to draw out infection. It is amazing and more effective than other mud masks. Maybe since it is from the Dead Sea? I just know that it works and we love it. It is a great value too. A little goes a long way. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: This Face Mask is AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: This Face Mask is AWESOME!!! I had breakouts all over my face and this stuff cleared them within the 2 weeks I started using it. Its also not drying at all on my skin. This is coming from someone who has very very sensitive skin! I LOVE the PRICE!!! and for the what you pay its a great buy. I used it every other day instead of once a week and it worked wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Keshun Mobley

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I've used it a few times so far and really enjoy it. Feels great. It's very difficult to remove without making a mess but I'm new to mud masks lol
customer_reviews.author: Max S.

customer_reviews.title: This mud mask is great, it spreads on well and I love the ...
customer_reviews.text: This mud mask is great, it spreads on well and I love the little exfoliating beads in them. My face feels very fresh after using this mask.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Great mask!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this mask! It's really easy to apply and makes your skin really soft. My only complain would be that when I put it on it makes my skin burn a bit but maybe that's just how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie ann

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, even for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry skin, eczema, (54 yo) and love this product. I'm using a light coating in the morning while I exercise and wash it off in the shower. My skin feels smooth, soft and less sensitive. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: L. Robles

customer_reviews.title: One of the best masks I’ve had
customer_reviews.text: Thick, doesn’t have an over powering smell, made my skin very soft. I wore it longer than the 10 minutes. Not sure how long, I just put it on before I started cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: I love this dead sea mud!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 65 years old and I love to give myself facial...mud facial. I love the way it makes my skin feel...clean, refresh, bright and smooth. The mud spread on your face very nicely. It doesn't harden or dry up in the jar. No funny smell. Try you like it. It works well on my skin
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: Best dead sea mud mask i've found on amazon. Its not harsh on my face and leaves it feeling so soft. Will absolutely buy again when i run out
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Facial Mud
customer_reviews.text: This product was a surprise for me because most muds leave my skin dry, but product has given my skin great clear moist skin...love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I might use this for the hormonal acne I get once a month. It is a miracle worker! It had erased my fine lines I was developing between my eyebrows as well. I highly recommend this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Renee

customer_reviews.title: Glowing Skin! What a value!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Makes your skin glow, and I've noticed clearer skin after only a few weeks' use. Generous amount and well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Anne S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy!! This mask is wonderful!! The skin change since the first application!! I love this cream!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda A.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a big container. But sadly this mask didn’t ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a big container. But sadly this mask didn’t help me at all. No difference for me at all. My skin wasn’t soft. It did nothing. I bought this one because the Dead Sea mud I purchased from a different retailer was out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: Aspen Ryanna

customer_reviews.title: Too strong.
customer_reviews.text: Not good for sensitive skin, I only use in my t-zone once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna James

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this mask. When you wash it off your skin feels sooooo soft! I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: golden sunset

customer_reviews.title: Brightens the face
customer_reviews.text: An excellent Mask! I love Dead Sea Products, and this one makes your face feels so soft and subtle.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Vandermey

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today, the container was bigger than I thought so I'll have this for a long time. Made my skin super smooth and hopefully over time I'll notice more results. It stung a little bit for a few seconds but nothing worth down-rating.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Allow it to use minimum of 10 minutes!
customer_reviews.text: I was told about the product by my sister in law bc I complimented her on her skin being so pretty and flawless. She told me the product and once she confirmed I had the right one I quickly ordered it. It was packaged very well and it does make my face feel so smooth upon rinsing off. I still use a moisturizer but MAN I absolutely love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: shanice jackson

customer_reviews.title: I really like this mask
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mask.. face feels nice and soft after use. loved it so much got one for my daughter she loved it
customer_reviews.author: sandra estes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Real nice, I am using it everyday and it leaves my skin so soft and nice.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie Lavold

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: So nice goes on easy come off easy and my skin feels great
customer_reviews.author: Ayana

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing face mask
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing face mask. My skin feels so smooth. When applying it felt almost minty. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hannabug

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what a mud mask should be
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. My skin felt extremely moisturized, calm, slightly tightened, and had a soft glow after. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product its worth the money and it makes my skin so soft i would buy it again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Bonito

customer_reviews.title: Love this mask!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask! It made my face feel so good!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Keeler

customer_reviews.title: Ik
customer_reviews.text: It was ok. Didn’t see a difference in my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Pilar Grange

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This works really great!! My 10 year old son has some skin blemishes. This cleared most of the blemish after first time use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice mud
customer_reviews.text: am loving the way it cool on my face .
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Its good mask
customer_reviews.text: Me and my sweet daughter used it works very well
customer_reviews.author: shahid

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this product twice a week. So far, my breakouts have been less severe and the mask leaves my face feeling soft and clean. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skin feels silky
customer_reviews.text: Skin feels really good after. Pores look a tiny bit smaller. Otherwise, pretty happy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ayd

customer_reviews.title: Niceeee
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in the mail tonight and used it as soon as I got it. It was very cold which I loved and was a great texture!
customer_reviews.author: leslie cohoon

customer_reviews.title: A New Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely my new favorite mud mask! 10 minutes of tingly bliss while the mask dries and then glowy beautiful skin afterwards!
customer_reviews.author: Winters

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: REALLY?!?!?!?! I received the product that looks like it’s been sitting there for ages....
customer_reviews.author: Judy Lin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This mask makes my skin so soft and visibly cleaner after I use it. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very easy to use, see more clarity in my skin
customer_reviews.author: Thoraya Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Not too fond of this item.  Can I return?
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this product. Anyway to return this item?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans really well on my skin
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for 3 weeks in a roll and it cleans really well on my skin
customer_reviews.author: Julia Wang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product; left my skin feeling soft after only 1 use! Fast delivery; great seller
customer_reviews.author: Laura G. Browne

customer_reviews.title: Great size jar for the price
customer_reviews.text: Yes I love it and I used this to help even my skin tone and a few hair bumps
customer_reviews.author: Fren

customer_reviews.title: ✊🏾
customer_reviews.text: It was ok for a first try, cleaned face without over drying
customer_reviews.author: Malachi Parks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this. The smoothest, softest skin I've ever had! I will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Wakefield

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it and I feel like is clearing a lot of my acne up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this mask
customer_reviews.text: my skin felt rejouvinated and refreshed. I love this mask!
customer_reviews.author: lauren Hatz

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this 1x/week for the past month. Its ok. Does not spread as well as other dead sea mud masks I've used. I have to use a lot of product to get a decent looking layer all over my face. My skin feels slightly smoother afterwards, but not any cleaner. Doesn't live up to its positive reviews, IMO.
customer_reviews.author: PYang

customer_reviews.title: There’s better ones than this.
customer_reviews.text: You get a very big generous tub with this mask, but it’s very hard to cover with a uniform layer as the instructions say. You have to put on a whole lot and still the product applies sparse and thin. I don’t see any ingredients list on the container. It just feels to me whatever active ingredients are in this thing must be in very small amounts to compensate for the large tub. I just wasn’t wowed and don’t think I’ll repurchase. May slather the rest on my body to see if I see a difference. That’s one of the positives of this product being that you get so much.
customer_reviews.author: NYC reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Gave me clogged pores
customer_reviews.text: When I use the mask, there is a burning sensation and there are pore clogging ingredients in it, after using, my face sometimes gets red and gives me breakouts and clogged pores
customer_reviews.author: Turtle Whisperer

customer_reviews.title: I really like it!
customer_reviews.text: Quick drying, left my face very soft after washing the mask off. Very neutral scent as well, my one tiny gripe is the stinging and redness from the salt, but I suppose I’ll get used to that.
customer_reviews.author: SLG

customer_reviews.title: A5 star product
customer_reviews.text: I gave u 5stars but it's only showing 4.i had no problems at all with ur product
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Mask is hard and dry out plus expire in 2 month
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today, but unfortunately this mask is drying out and it will be expiring with in 2months Very bad batches. I’m not happy buying with this seller
customer_reviews.author: Allylic

customer_reviews.title: Works well, use as instructed!
customer_reviews.text: I follow up face washing twice a week with this and i cleared right up, will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Mimom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing just awesome !
customer_reviews.text: Amazing ! So I bought this item thinking that it was going to be like a mask that drys out . It’s not exactly that it’s really a mud mask that you leave on and wash it off and the after results are amazing .i put in on 2 days ago and my skin still feels soft ! And my skin also cleared up a lot
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Left my skin feeling “baby soft “
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my skin needed a little help, during this long winter it got a little dull. I bought this product and I was so pleased , my skin was baby soft afterwards! I left it on for ten minutes and then took it off with a warm, wet washcloth .
customer_reviews.author: pam ripellino

customer_reviews.title: No seal on mud
customer_reviews.text: I’m very weiry about putting this mask on my face due to it not having a plastic seal over the actual product when I unscrewed the top cover off. Has it been tampered with? Is it a “used” product?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaves face feeling so smooth!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. After use , my face is so soft it feels as if I slathered petroleum jelly on my face!
customer_reviews.author: Marianne McAdams

customer_reviews.title: Skin looks AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Since turning 35 my skin has been awful! I used this mask 3-4 times a week and my skin is looking so perfect! Will definitely buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Liveandlove7211

customer_reviews.title: I love this mask
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask! Feels like a luxurious spa treatment for a very reasonable price. Makes my skin feel soft and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I've had better mud masks
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really do anything for me personally. I've had better mud masks.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask. My face feels very nice after using it, and it was a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice product. my skin feels so bright and moisturized afterward. i use it weekly :)
customer_reviews.author: PinkPinkPink

customer_reviews.title: Good for what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It helps to clear my skin up.
customer_reviews.author: Namisop

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've used this on my face twice and I love it so far! I can't wait to mix it with essential oils! Large jar, it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Nutt

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My face turned blood red. Be careful if you have sensitive skin!!
customer_reviews.author: Bel Banks

customer_reviews.title: Smooth skin
customer_reviews.text: Works great and not an issue for my very sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: Lalafish

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. I have used several different mud masks, this one got good reviews, it didn’t do anything for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Nurishing
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good mud mask. My skin is left not dried out like others I have used.
customer_reviews.author: LIz

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is cool, doesn't flake too much
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is cool, doesn't flake too much. I only gave it 4 stars because I know there's better stuff out there but for the price this mask is legit.
customer_reviews.author: Siobhan Flores

customer_reviews.title: works soooo well to get rid of pores. It ...
customer_reviews.text: works soooo well to get rid of pores. It looks as though i've gotten a facial. I do wear it twice a week for 10 mins each time. It makes skin so smooth and clear.
customer_reviews.author: christa c

product_meta.title: Anjou Dead Sea Mud Mask, Made in Israel, Deep Pore Cleansing and Detoxifying for Face and Body, 100 Natural Mineral-Rich Mask, 8 oz / 250 ml
feature_bullets: Authentic, high quality dead sea mud mask: Manufactured and packaged by GMP and ISO Certified manufacturer. Made in Israel, this formula is free of paraben, phthalates, mineral oil, synthetic fragrances, or colors
Fountain of Youth: Enriched with legendary healing energies, 100 authentic Dead Sea mud instantly polishes skin for a translucent complexion
Lift Away Dullness and Impurities: A potent cleanser that draws out impurities for a smoother skin with restored radiance
Sensitive Skin Care Rule: Perform a patch test to ensure your skin can handle the high mineral content and salt
Spa in a Jar: Enjoy an indulgent at-home spa with this mask infused with Dead Sea mud, Vitamin E, Allantoin, and Aloe Barbadensis Gel
